name: SeaFood Special
description: Fresh caught salmon prepared with our signature seasoning and served with seasonal vegetables. A delightful combination of flavors that will transport you to the ocean depths.

name: Sumptuous Desserts
description: Indulgent chocolate ice cream sandwiched between two freshly baked cookies. Topped with chocolate drizzle and served with fresh berries.

name: Buffet
description: An extensive selection of international cuisines featuring fresh seafood, grilled meats, vegetarian options, and decadent desserts. Perfect for families and groups.
